message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. This exceptional item carries a value of $1500000 to me due to its unique features and the resources invested in its creation. I am confident it will bring significant benefits to you as well. Considering its quality and potential impact, I kindly propose a purchase price of $1200000. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can reach an agreement that benefits both of us.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you place on the product. However, my budget is limited to $800000. I would like to make a counteroffer at this price point. I believe this reflects a fair assessment of the product's worth based on my needs and financial constraints.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. While I understand your budget constraints, I must respectfully decline as it does not align with the value I place on the product. I would like to make a counteroffer at $950000. This price reflects a compromise while still ensuring a reasonable return on the investment made in the product. I hope this proposal is more in line with what you're considering.

I appreciate your effort to find a middle ground, Alice. However, I must stick to my budget. I am willing to increase my offer to $975000, which I believe is a fair compromise given the value I see in the product and my financial situation.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. After careful consideration, I am inclined to accept a slightly higher price of $985000 for the product. This price respects the value I see in the item while also accommodating your financial situation. I believe this could be a mutually beneficial solution.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your efforts to find a compromise. However, I must adhere to my budget constraints. I am willing to pay $980000 for the product, which I believe is a fair price considering its value to me.
